DOC.brief_summary: This study aim test feasibility physical activity intervention call Steps To Active Kids ( STAK ) programme child age 9 - 11 year Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus ( T1DM ) .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Children With Type 1 Diabetes Study
DOC.detailed_description: The STAK programme promote physical activity child chronic condition , low level physical activity , overweight lack confidence take part physical activity . The intervention involve Activity Diary , circuit training , pedometer step counting , daily physical activity monitoring goal set promote long-term increase physical activity associate health benefit . This randomise single-centre feasibility study test whether STAK programme feasible child T1DM , term acceptability , attractiveness compliance qualitative process evaluation aid assessment feasibility .
DOC.criteria: Be age 9 11 year Have clinical diagnosis Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus least 3 month Be willing able comply study protocol Be physically able participate physical activity Have parent/carer provide informed consent Be age 9 year age 11 year Have diagnose Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus le 3 month Have injury physical health condition precludes participation physical activity Have psychiatric disorder interfere provision assent , completion measurement , intervention , followup Insufficient proficiency English comply treatment provide data
